properties.play_title: Agnes Under the Big Top, a tall tale
properties.event_description:
Aditi Kapil's AGNES UNDER THE BIG TOP, A TALL TALE was first produced as part of a National New Play Network Rolling World Premiere at Mixed Blood (Minneapolis, MN), Long Wharf Theatre (New Haven, CT), and Borderlands (Tucson, AZ) with funding from the Continued Life of New Plays Fund.
www.nnpn.org
properties.synopsis:
Agnes Under the Big Top, a tall tale
Generative Artist: 
Aditi Brennan Kapil

Synopsis

Aditi Brennan Kapil's play AGNES UNDER THE BIG TOP, A TALL TALE was first produced in a National New Play Network Rolling World Premiere at Mixed Blood Theatre (Minneapolis, MN), Long Wharf Theatre (New Haven, CT), and Borderlands (Tucson, AZ) with support from the Continued Life of New Plays Fund.www.nnpn.org // Against the subterranean rhythms of a subway train, an itinerant subway busker, a Liberian home care worker, a former Bulgarian ringmaster and his wife, and an Indian call center escapee find and redefine themselves in today’s America. [Source: http://www.mixedblood.com/mainstage/agnes]

properties.related_theater: Tofte Lake Center at Norm's Fish Camp
properties.play_title: Agnes Under the Big Top, a tall tale
properties.event_description: A summer retreat/residency. Wrote first few scenes of 'The Starling Project', which would become 'Agnes Under the Big Top, a tall tale'.
properties.synopsis:
Agnes Under the Big Top, a tall tale
Generative Artist: 
Aditi Brennan Kapil

Synopsis

Aditi Brennan Kapil's play AGNES UNDER THE BIG TOP, A TALL TALE was first produced in a National New Play Network Rolling World Premiere at Mixed Blood Theatre (Minneapolis, MN), Long Wharf Theatre (New Haven, CT), and Borderlands (Tucson, AZ) with support from the Continued Life of New Plays Fund.www.nnpn.org // Against the subterranean rhythms of a subway train, an itinerant subway busker, a Liberian home care worker, a former Bulgarian ringmaster and his wife, and an Indian call center escapee find and redefine themselves in today’s America. [Source: http://www.mixedblood.com/mainstage/agnes]
